name: neuropilot
description: Lets Neuro-sama provide inline completions in VS Code

neuropilot.websocketUrl.description: The URL to connect to the Neuro API

neuropilot.gameName.description: The name to use for this "game"

neuropilot.beforeContext.description: The number of lines before the cursor position to include in the completion request

neuropilot.afterContext.description: The number of lines after the cursor position to include in the completion request

neuropilot.maxCompletions.description: The maximum number of completions to request

enumDescriptions: Only request completions when the user explicitly invokes the completion provider
Automatically request completions when the user stops typing

neuropilot.initialContext.default: You are using an extension in Visual Studio Code that allows you to code together with Vedal.
neuropilot.initialContext.description: The initial context to sent to Neuro-sama

neuropilot.timeout.description: The timeout in milliseconds for completions and chat responses in ms

neuropilot.includePattern.markdownDescription: A glob pattern for files Neuro is allowed to open, i.e. she will be unable to open files that don't match this pattern. Separate multiple patterns with a newline.

neuropilot.excludePattern.markdownDescription: A glob pattern for files Neuro is not allowed to open. Applied after the include pattern. Files and folders beginning with a dot are always excluded, regardless of this setting. Separate multiple patterns with a newline.

name.description: The name Neuro can reference this terminal by

path.description: The path to the terminal executable

args.description: The arguments to pass to the terminal executable

neuropilot.terminals.description: A list of terminals Neuro can use.

neuropilot.permission.openFiles.markdownDescription:
Let Neuro open files in the workspace. For security reasons, Neuro cannot open anything that starts with a dot or has a parent folder that starts with a dot (e.g. `.git`, `.vscode`, ...).

Requires reloading permissions if changed.

neuropilot.permission.editActiveDocument.markdownDescription:
Let Neuro edit the active file directly.

Requires reloading permissions if changed.

neuropilot.permission.create.markdownDescription:
Let Neuro create new files and folders in the workspace.

Requires reloading permissions if changed.

neuropilot.permission.rename.markdownDescription:
Let Neuro rename files and folders in the workspace.

Requires reloading permissions if changed.

neuropilot.permission.delete.markdownDescription:
Let Neuro delete files and folders in the workspace.

Requires reloading permissions if changed.

neuropilot.permission.runTasks.markdownDescription:
Let Neuro run workspace tasks defined in `tasks.json`.

Requires reloading permissions if changed.

neuropilot.permission.requestCookies.markdownDescription:
Neuro may ask for cookies while coding.

Requires reloading permissions if changed.

neuropilot.permission.gitOperations.markdownDescription:
Allow Neuro to perform Git operations in the workspace.

Requires reloading permissions if changed.

neuropilot.permission.gitTags.markdownDescription:
Allow Neuro to create and delete tags in Git repositories.

Requires reloading permissions if changed.

neuropilot.permission.gitRemotes.markdownDescription:
Allow Neuro to push, pull and fetch commits.
Also requires Git Operations permission to be enabled.

Requires reloading permissions if changed.

neuropilot.permission.editRemoteData.markdownDescription:
Allow Neuro to add, remove and rename remotes.
Also requires Git Operations & Git Remotes permissions to be enabled.

Requires reloading permissions if changed.

neuropilot.permission.gitConfigs.markdownDescription:
Allow Neuro to view and edit Git configuration in the workspace.
Also requires Git Operations permission to be enabled.

Requires reloading permissions if changed.

neuropilot.permission.terminalAccess.markdownDescription: Allow Neuro __direct terminal access__. Be very careful with this.
